comment: Pho, the only dish that can make you feel warm inside and challenge your chopstick skills at the same time!
name: Pho
description: An aromatic noodle soup with beef, chicken or tofu.
ingredients: Beef or chicken (brisket, sirloin, or chicken breast)

comment: Why did the Bánh mì break up with the sandwich? Because it found someone who really understood its layers!
name: Bánh mì
description: Vietnamese baguettes filled with grilled meat, pickled vegetables and creamy sauces.

comment: Why did the Bánh Xèo break up with the spring roll? Because it found someone a little more 'crispy' with a 'sizzling' personality!
name: Bánh xèo
description: Crispy Vietnamese pancakes with fillings such as shrimp or pork.

comment: If bubble tea were a person, it would definitely be the fun friend who always brings the party with them!
name: Bubble Tea
description: A refreshing and sweet drink with tapioca pearls in different flavors.
